reviewText: This movie is so beautifully done with a cast and crew of Fort Worth artists.  It''s not just entertaining to have in a home, but important for classrooms of all grades to have, too. A must see!!!

What an interesting account of the history and renovation of the Rose Theatre in Fort Worth! This film tells a fascinating story of how this famous landmark has contributed to the identity and lives of the Hispanic population in North Side. Its a must-watch not only for the community but for anyone who has an interest in or a connection to Fort Worth!
